amendment.description: To enhance the energy security of the United States by prohibiting the exportation of oil and gas produced under leases in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.

action.text: Amendment SA 2362 proposed by Senator Wyden to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 2358.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2362 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 83 - 16. Record Vote Number: 289.
